name: NewsTalkKGVOMissoula–FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: NewsTalk KGVO Missoula Flash Briefing brings you the latest Montana state headlines covering politics, business, crime, local events, and the weather, each and every day. Visit newstalkkgvo.com for more or download our free NewsTalk KGVO app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
